title: Ejercicios: Problemas y Preguntas en Pasado

exercises.question: What is the first thing you should do if your card is stolen?
options: Call the bank to cancel it
exercises.explanation: You must cancel a stolen card immediately to prevent fraud.

exercises.question: ________ (you / call) the security department? No, I ________ (not / have) the number.
exercises.explanation: We use 'Did' for questions and 'didn't' for negatives in the past simple.
